message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10750. This is a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'm willing to offer $9000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.
